biotools.summary:
gene expression clustering optimization app for non-linear data visualization of patterns.

Welcome to GECO (Gene Expression Clustering Optimization), the straightforward, user friendly Streamlit app to visualize and investigate data patterns with non-linear reduced dimensionality plots. Although developed for bulk RNA-seq data, GECO can be used to analyze any .csv data matrix with sample names (columns) and type (rows) [type = genes, protein, any other unique ID].
